actions.committee: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for certain vessels to participate in transporting salmon to on-shore processing plants in Alaska.

summary.text: Allows foreign-flag tender vessels to transport salmon from vessels owned by citizens of the United States to onshore processing plants in Alaska during the 1980 salmon season. Directs the Secretary of Commerce to promulgate regulations to assure that such foreign-flag tender vessels do not displace domestically owned tender vessels.

titles.title: A bill to provide for certain vessels to participate in transporting salmon to on-shore processing plants in Alaska.
